Package ePortfolio

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
ePortfolio.Investment
ePortfolio.Stock
public class Stock extends Investment
Represents a stock in an investment portfolio. This class extends the Investment class and provides specific functionality for stocks, including commission fee calculation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Stock(String symbol)
    Constructs a Stock object with only the specified symbol.
    Stock(String name, String symbol, int quantity, double price)
    Constructs a Stock object with the specified name, symbol, quantity, and price.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stock

      public Stock(String name, String symbol, int quantity, double price)
      Constructs a Stock object with the specified name, symbol, quantity, and price.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the stock.
      symbol - The stock symbol.
      quantity - The quantity of the stock.
      price - The price of the stock.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if quantity is less than 1 or price is less than 0.01.

    • Stock

      public Stock(String symbol)
      Constructs a Stock object with only the specified symbol. The default values for name, quantity, and price are set to "a", 0, and 0, respectively.
      Parameters:
      symbol - The stock symbol.

  • Method Details

    • getFee

      public double getFee()
      Returns the fixed commission fee for stock transactions.
      Overrides:
      getFee in class Investment
      Returns:
      The commission fee as a double.

    • getValue

      public double getValue()
      Returns the commission fee. Placeholder for calculating the current value of the stock based on other data.
      Overrides:
      getValue in class Investment
      Returns:
      The current value of the stock as a double.
